section.title: Leap.Unity.OldRigHierarchy.OldLeapSpaceData Class Reference

listitem.para: Some rigs, like the old image rig or modifications to the old standard rig, may have non-LeapHandController transforms as children of the LeapSpace object. These objects should be moved to be children of the Camera directly.

Some rigs, like the old image rig or modifications to the old standard rig, may have non-LeapHandController transforms as children of the LeapSpace object. These objects should be moved to be children of the Camera directly.
